articles.title: China protests Europe's new wind-turbine probe and report alleging 'distortions in the economy' - South China Morning Post
articles.description: State subsidies are in Brussels’ cross hairs as the world’s largest windpower producer exports low-cost turbines to quench global demand for clean power.
articles.content: Beijing has voiced strong opposition to the European Commissions plan to investigate Chinese wind turbines over state subsidies and has decried a report from Brussels alleging distortions in the econ… [+4879 chars]
